title: Quiz
content:
Chapter Quiz

Answer the following questions to check your understanding of this chapter's topics.

questions.question: In the context of 'Multipage and Architecture', which statement about configuration management is most accurate?
choices: Configuration Management always requires external services to work in Streamlit.
Configuration Management is useful in some cases, but you should evaluate complexity and UX trade-offs.
Configuration Management is deprecated and should be avoided in all Streamlit apps.
Configuration Management only works when running Streamlit in Docker.
questions.explanation: Configuration Management is a powerful pattern, but like most advanced techniques, it should be used judiciously with attention to user impact and maintainability.
